Reviews.Title: Good unlocked phone for the price
Reviews.Author: RGW
Reviews.Content: This is a very good unlocked phone for about $300.  It uses a standard SIM card.  The screen is very nice too.  I like all the features on and Android phone.  I bought this phone to use in China the next time I go.

Reviews.Title: Works flawlessly with Net10
Reviews.Author: S. Huffman
Reviews.Content: I'm using this phone with an ATT sim from Net10.  It works perfectly.  You get full 3G data speeds on the network.  Phone works great.  Very clear and easy to hear.

Reviews.Title: excellent..
Reviews.Author: jimmy gomez
Reviews.Content: well, its my second samsung cell phone (before i had an ace2),, and i haven't had any inconvenience,,, highly recommendable.

Reviews.Title: wrong box or wrong Product...
Reviews.Author: Alejandro C. Carias R "Alejandro C."
Reviews.Content: i bought a i8190L and SORPRISE!!!! i get a i8190 in the box of one i8190L....... Bad Bad....... samsung mistake???

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Liliana Avila
Reviews.Content: This phone meets all my expectations, there were no problems whatsoever with the delivery or the phone itself. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: was not unlocked
Reviews.Author: Mari Dekujako
Reviews.Content: I just bought a miniS3 from.you to bring it to Venezuela, and it did not came unlocked as it says.  Very upset!

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: gleetha
Reviews.Content: this was my first official smart phone so i was excited to receive it  in January 2014 however when it arrive there was problems first with the charger so l bought a new charger then there is a problem with the battery so l am about to buy a new battery and this is only May2014  four months since i have this phone it was suppose to be a new phone i am angry and i don,t think i got value for money hence it got two stars buyers beware

Reviews.Title: nicee
Reviews.Author: shas
Reviews.Content: works great.... manual didnt come in english doe :/ ..... wasnt gonna read it anyways XDbottom line it works great, expected it a little earlier doe..

Reviews.Title: Replacing stolen phone exactly the same
Reviews.Author: Monica Rivero
Reviews.Content: I bought this device for my daughter; since she got her stolen. It is exactly the  same as the one she had before.  It is a good product. I recommend the product and the seller 100%

Reviews.Title: Has worked on both Straight Talk and AT&T; network
Reviews.Author: Donnie
Reviews.Content: We got my wife one of these phones for Christmas and I liked it so much I bought me one when it dropped from 230 down to a little under 200. The one I ordered is a version GT-I8190L and my wifes is a GT-I8190. Hers came in UK english and with an adapter for its charger to fit US outlets, mine came in Spanish and its charger required no adapter, both were easily changed to US english. Besides the L at the end of mine and an american type charger I can tell no difference between the 2 phones. We started on Straight Talk which requires creating a new APN for correct functionality, I found the settings to put in it with a google search. We then both changed to my dads business ATT plan and the default cingular APN that comes on the phones works with this network. The phone does not do 4g but does some kind of H speed which I think is like 3.5 g and it has been fast enough for me to watch my IP cameras. For the money currently I can not think of a better smart phone. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Fit
Reviews.Author: brianshale
Reviews.Content: Great features in small package. perfect smartphone for small hands. only gripe is that you have to remove the battery to access the SD card.

Reviews.Title: Wrong phone sent
Reviews.Author: Joe Lacy
Reviews.Content: I was sent a I8190L phone instead of a I8190.  The I8190 would discharge the battery in less than 5 hours and the reception was very poor.  I had to restart my phone to get a decent signal.

Reviews.Title: phone does not work
Reviews.Author: roque
Reviews.Content: after 15 days of use, the phone does not work, I want to replace it, what would be the procedure came to Venezuela on 11/29/2013.
